de.saschafeldmann.adesso.master.thesis.util.csv

Interface CsvWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CsvWriterImpl

    public interface CsvWriter
    Project: Masterthesis of Sascha Feldmann Creation date: 12.07.2016 Author: Sascha Feldmann (sascha.feldmann@gmx.de)

    University: Hochschule f√ºr Technik und Wirtschaft, Berlin Fachbereich 4 Studiengang Internationale Medieninformatik (Master)

    Company: adesso AG

    A CSV writer produces a CSV file.
    It is a simple text file which consists of coluuns, where each column is separated by a delimiter and lines for each row.
    The default delimiter is the semicolon ';'
    A UTF-8 encoded CSV file will be generated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRow(java.lang.String... columns)
      Adds a row.
      void setDelimiter(java.lang.String delimiter)
      Sets the delimiter and overwrites the default one (;).
      java.io.File writeToFile(java.lang.String directory, java.lang.String filename)
      Finally writes the CSV contents to a file.

        java.io.File writeToFile(java.lang.String directory,
